actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to provide that rents shall not be exempted from any application of this act solely upon the ground that such rents are subject to local rent control laws.

summary.text: Provides that rents shall not be exempted from any application of the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 solely upon the ground that such rents are subject to local rent control laws. (Amends 12 U.S.C. 1904nt)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to provide that rents shall not be exempted from any application of this act solely upon the ground that such rents are subject to local rent control laws.
